trans-unit.source: Specifies the levels of trace messages filtered by the source switch and event type filter.
trans-unit.target: Especifica os níveis de rastreamento de mensagens filtradas pelo comutador de origem e o filtro de tipo de evento.

trans-unit.source: The source levels identify the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType> events that are to be traced.
trans-unit.target: Os níveis de origem é identificar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType> eventos que devem ser rastreadas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.SourceSwitch> class uses the <xref:System.Diagnostics.SourceLevels> enumeration to define the event level of the trace message to use for filtering messages to send to the trace listener.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Diagnostics.SourceSwitch> classe usa a <xref:System.Diagnostics.SourceLevels> enumeração para definir o nível da mensagem de rastreamento a ser usado para filtragem de mensagens para enviar para o ouvinte de rastreamento de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventTypeFilter> class uses the <xref:System.Diagnostics.SourceLevels> enumeration to determine whether a trace listener should emit a trace.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventTypeFilter> classe usa a <xref:System.Diagnostics.SourceLevels> enumeração para determinar se um ouvinte de rastreamento emitirá um rastreamento.

Permite a passagem dos eventos <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Stop" />, <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Start" />, <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Suspend" />, <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Transfer" /> e <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Resume" />.
Permite a passagem de todos os eventos.
Permite a passagem somente de eventos <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Critical" />.
Permite a passagem de eventos <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Critical" /> e <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Error" />.

Permite a passagem de eventos <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Critical" />, <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Error" />, <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Warning" /> e <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Information" />.

trans-unit.source: Does not allow any events through.
trans-unit.target: Não permite a passagem de nenhum evento.

Permite a passagem de eventos <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Critical" />, <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Error" />, <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Warning" />, <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Information" /> e <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Verbose" />.

Permite a passagem de eventos <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Critical" />, <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Error" /> e <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Warning" />.
